item.title: CVE-2024-35773|2024-07-12T13:31:43.110Z -- wpjohnny%2C%20zeroneit -- comment%20reply%20email
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPJohnny, zerOneIT Comment Reply Email allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Comment Reply Email: from n/a through 1.3.
